typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	moveFiles: ['/input','work'],
	format: 'excel',
	fileSystem: 'as186113',
	folderPath: 'input',
	fileName: 'Emp_info_m.csv',
	sheetName: 'Emp_info_m',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'excel',
	fileSystem: 'as186113',
	folderPath: 'input',
	fileName: 'Emp_info_f.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'Emp_info_f',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> source2
source1, source2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
